text: The 2014–15 ISU Short Track Speed Skating World Cup was a multi-race tournament over a season for short track speed skating. The season began on 7 November 2014 and ended on 15 February 2015. The World Cup was organised by the ISU who also ran world cups and championships in speed skating and figure skating. In a break from normal tradition, the 4th leg of the world cup, held in Seoul, included a 3000m individual event for both the Men and Women. ==Calendar== === Men === ==== Salt Lake City 7–9 November 2014==== {| bgcolor="#f7f8ff" cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0" border="1" style="font-size: 95%;
